notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: MF conceptualized and designed the study, analyzed and interpreted the data, and drafted and revised the manuscript. DK and FRT conceptualized and designed the study, participated in analysis and interpretation of the data, and revised the manuscript. GA participated in designing the study and preparation of the intervention materials. RN designed the study and drafted and revised the manuscript. All authors have read and approved the final version of the manuscript and ensured this is the case.
